error.msg: (IAR VERBOSE,IAR) A compatible declaration shall be visible when an object or function with external linkage is defined
error.verbose: A compatible declaration shall be visible when an object or function with external linkage is defined

error.msg: (IAR VERBOSE,IAR,CC_ARM,CC_ARM VERBOSE) Functions and objects should not be defined with external linkage if they are referenced in only one translation unit
error.verbose: Functions and objects should not be defined with external linkage if they are referenced in only one translation unit

error.msg: (CC_ARM,CC_ARM VERBOSE) A compatible declaration shall be visible when an object or function with external linkage is defined
error.verbose: A compatible declaration shall be visible when an object or function with external linkage is defined
